wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Edward Cooper Hodge  (19 April 1810 – 10 December 1894) was a British Army officer.

link_mentions.page: Order of battle for the Balaclava campaign
response: *** 4th (Royal Irish) Regiment of Dragoon Guards - Lt. Col. Edward Hodge
Major Edward Hodge (1782 – 17 June 1815) was a British Army officer killed in action the day before the 1815 Battle of Waterloo.
